pages.text: Every plushable is crafted with either a $(6)Heart of Gold$() or a $(c)Powered $(6)Heart of Gold$()
pages.title: Hearts of Gold

pages.text: To make many plushables you will need many hearts.$(br)$(li)Flowers can be grown from the ground with bonemeal$(li)Gold will need to be mined or sourced from the nether$(li)Bottles of honey are easiest to obtain by setting up a thriving bee farm.
pages.title: Hearts of Gold

pages.text: If you want more information about beehives and bottling honey, click the button below. It takes you to the Minecraft wiki entry about beehives.
